long_description: The moisture-wicking and stretchy Brooks Sherpa 2-in-1 Shorts for women keep up with your long runs, and their 6 in. inseam and great fit prove that a longer inseam length doesn't have to look frumpy. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric features plenty of stretch to enhance mobility. Moisture-wicking internal boy shorts with pocket ensure comfort next to skin, and silicone grippers at leg openings keep legs in place. Rear zippered pocket stores accessories and internal pocket stores a key or ID. Flat, knit waistband personalizes the fit. The semifitted Brooks Sherpa 2-in-1 Shorts for women are not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The moisture-wicking and stretchy Brooks Sherpa 2-in-1 Shorts for women keep up with your long runs, and their 6 in. inseam and great fit prove that a longer inseam length doesn't have to look frumpy.
